description:
WARNING! HIGHLY ADDICTIVE GAMING CONTENT!

Playing Jump O' Clock can lead to severely extended sessions of gameplay! Take control of the lovable steampunk robot LE0 and jump from gear to gear while avoiding hazards in an endless upward world. Collect bolts to fill your SUPER-JUMP METER, and BOOST the height of your jumps. Timing is crucial to keep from winding up on the wrong side of the razor-sharp teeth, scalding steam, electrified wires or broken pipes. If you've got time, Jump O' Clock has your challenge - an endless platform adventure which never plays the same twice. Why try and beat a clock when you can JUMP O' CLOCK?

FEATURES:

-    Endless vertical platform game - LIKE DOODLE JUMP - jump from gear to gear in an effort to climb as high as possible

-    The infinite adventure is NEVER THE SAME GAME TWICE!

-    Earn more points as LE0 climbs higher and higher in the clockworks. COLLECT BOLTS for extra points and to fill the SUPER-JUMP METER, earning BOOSTS to jump HIGHER.
